lead_paragraph: A Hamburg regulator said on Tuesday that neither the messenger nor its parent company had received individuals’ permission to share digital information.

headline.print_headline: German Regulator Orders Facebook to Stop Collecting Data on WhatsApp Users
headline.main: Facebook Ordered to Stop Collecting Data on WhatsApp Users in Germany

snippet: A Hamburg regulator said on Tuesday that neither the messenger nor its parent company had received individuals’ permission to share digital information....
abstract: Hamburg's data protection commissioner orders Facebook to cease collecting and storing data on WhatsApp users in Germany.
